channel.title: How to make Fanta in 8 Steps! Really Works!
channel.description:
Step 1: Buy 100 packets of Orange Kool-Aid (see photo below)
[img]http://www.x-entertainment.com/kool-aid/reviews/orange/1.jpg[/img]
Step 2: Buy 10 Bottles of Seltzer Water (see photo below)
[img]http://www.therefrigerator.net/features/food/images/seltzer.jpg[/img]
Step 3: Open the bottles of seltzer.
Step 4: Spill 1/8 of the seltzer out of each bottle into the drain.
Step 5: Add 10 packets of Kool-Aid into each bottle of seltzer
Step 6: Close the bottles of seltzer [b][i][u]TIGHTLY[/u][/i][/b].
Step 7: Shake vigorously for about 1 minute
Step 8: Let stand for 30 seconds.
TADA! You made your own Fanta!

item.title: How to make Fanta in 8 Steps! Really Works!

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:
